website_summaries.verdict: A deluxe art center that provides budding artists with all the room they need to let their creativity run wild while offering loads of storage to keep supplies organized. Ideal for multi-child use.
pros: Integrated design boasts a flat desk and bench as well as a double sided easel with a chalkboard on one side and a magnetic dry erase board on the other, offering endless options for artistic expression
Storage bins, built-in trays, and shelves provide a wealth of storage space to help keep art supplies organized
Great for artwork, learning, homework, and simple fun
Room for up to 3 kids to play simultaneously
cons: All art supplies need to be bought separately
No pre-drilled holes can make assembly a chore

customer_reviews.title: Tons of fun for your kids!!!! Highly recommend!!!
customer_reviews.text: My kids love the Step2 Art Center. It has provided hours of fun and some great artwork. We bought the Step2 Art Center after visiting friends who have the Art Center and noticing how much our kids played with it while we were there. The instructions were easy to follow and it is very sturdy. I would highly recommend the Art Center.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Not my favorite Step2 Product
customer_reviews.text: I love Step2 products. I find myself feeling biased for the first time with a Step2 product. We own a Step2 Art Master Desk, which is fabulous. Instead of buying another desk for my other child, I opted for something different. I have been so impressed with the durability of so many Step2 products, but this art center seems wobbly. I would suggest to buy another Step2 product, as this art center desk may deter you from buying other fantastic Step2 products.
customer_reviews.author: Smith

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Easy to put together and high quality. Lots of different play and storage features. Perfect for our art-loving 3-year-old!
customer_reviews.author: R. Peppard

customer_reviews.title: HAVE NOT'S !
customer_reviews.text: You say you only have 2 left so I ordered it and next thing I know you tell me sorry but we sold them all out! Yet you advertise that you still have 2 left hmmm why not just remove that art board until you have more to sell??? I thought I had the perfect gift when I bought this just don't like it when you say yes we have 2 left and then you say sorry we had to cancel your order, now I'm left without a gift for my GrandSon. Not a Happy Shopper that's for sure. ' s
customer_reviews.author: Cindy  Burgess

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t come with holes
customer_reviews.text: I bought a month ago and I haven’t been able to set it up because there is no way to screw the pieces together. There are no holes and the plastic isn’t something to just push the screws into.
customer_reviews.author: Casey Richardson

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product once assembled
customer_reviews.text: Although my package came damaged badly taped I decided to put the product together and lo and behold it turned out very nicely. I was a little bit upset as I couldn't give it to my granddaughter for her birthday but all in all everything turned out awesome I would highly recommend this product to anyone that's interested in purchasing it. Although the people handling it needs to be retrained thank you
customer_reviews.author: Marette A. Lewis

customer_reviews.title: Late and poor condition
customer_reviews.text: Box was just delivered a day late. The box is in terrible condition and obviously was opened and retaped . Need to see what’s missing inbox now. Very disappointing purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Need a drill to put together
customer_reviews.text: The final product is fine, but putting it together REQUIRES a drill. I am usually pretty good at putting things together and it wouldn’t be hard to put this together IF there were some pre-drilled holes. Also, somethings weren’t cut right so demensions don’t line up exactly.
customer_reviews.author: Rhonda Dale

customer_reviews.title: Bummed out
customer_reviews.text: Really bummed about this Purchased this couple weeks ago saving it for Christmas day for the kids to play with two of the major components are missing ( I and G )now I got to figure out how to return this thing or get the parts sent , not sure how , but besides that it’s everything I thought it would be , let’s see how hard it is to get these two parts
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for two grandsons!
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my grandsons who are 3 and 4. They can both use it at the same time. Lots of storage. They are enjoying it! The reason for only 4 stars on sturdiness.... The seat is built into the unit and they have to climb over it to sit down. A separate seat would probably be better.
customer_reviews.author: TMac

customer_reviews.title: Love hate relationship
customer_reviews.text: So cute and my son loves it. Not enough storage for paper, could have a pocket or something in the back. Pit enough space for supplies. Absolutely ridiculous to put together!! You have to screw everything in at least 2-4 screws with each step (theres 25+) and it is very difficult to screw into plastic... i would suggest using a drill (even though they dont suggest it on the instructions) we spent 45 mintues for the first 10 steps before mt hands were red & sore & i grabbed the drill.
customer_reviews.author: Brianna

customer_reviews.title: Assembly issues
customer_reviews.text: Almost had 4 to 5 stars. It's sturdy but there is no way you can assemble this without a drill of some sort. Even just a cheap one will work then you need elbow grease to get the screws in ... They show that you need a regular screw driver but that will not work at all. And most of the holes are not pre drilled so you have to guess where to put them. Overall assembly was the worst so far but it looks very sturdy and usable ... My 3yo loves it
customer_reviews.author: Megan W.

customer_reviews.title: YES YES YES!! But it’s missing HOLES!!!
customer_reviews.text: He loves it!!! Wanted to sit on it forever!!! Perfect gift for 3 year old. However, it was a headache putting it together and took twice as long to assemble it. It’s missing holes for the screws. And there are A LOT of screws. Have to make holes with an electric drill. But in the end, it was totally worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin

customer_reviews.title: Our grandson loves it!
customer_reviews.text: We got this for our 5 year old grandson for Christmas and he absolutely loves it. It wasn't the easiest thing to put together our daughter-in-love said, but she was able to do it by herself. It's sturdy and well worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: Angela Lidh

customer_reviews.title: Horrible to put together, need a drill.
customer_reviews.text: Once it is put together it is great, and my kids love using it. But there are no screw holes which makes it very hard to put together by yourself. After 2 hours and lots of colorful words later, I finally got it put together. I wanted to throw this out in the firepit and burn the stupid thing.
customer_reviews.author: Brataleya Curtis

customer_reviews.title: Exactly as advertised
customer_reviews.text: My 6 year old loves having an art station in the house, and I love that my kitchen table is no longer overtaken with art supplies. I am not sure it will be too long before he physically outgrows it, but he loves it and it is well worth the money!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love art
customer_reviews.text: I love this art center! It has everything for a child to be able to create their beautiful art. From standing to sitting to great storage options.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: No holes for the screws/manufacture error
customer_reviews.text: It just came in and I was really excited to have it setup before my son woke up from his nap. I took out all the part to make sure I had them all and then began to assemble when I noticed all the holes for the screws were nonexistant. Can't put it together if I can't put the screw into anything. Called customer service but they are closed. I will try again tomorrow.
customer_reviews.author: Bench Books

customer_reviews.title: Great after assembly
customer_reviews.text: Love it so far after a few months, real sturdy and good looking. Was horrible to assemble- holes were not where they were supposed to be and had to drill our own. Took a while as well.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very easy to assemble and my niece loves sitting at her ...
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to assemble and my niece loves sitting at her “desk” to color and work on her projects. The storage is awesome we were able to get most of her books and supplies stored with room to spare.
customer_reviews.author: TamNels1

customer_reviews.title: Best Buy
customer_reviews.text: This was a big hit for my girls! They are little artists in the making and love to color, paint, craft, etc. every single day. :) Between our youngest (2 years old) and our oldest (5 years) climbing and jumping on it, it’s held up to its durability! Definitely something you wanna consider buying if your kiddos love to do all the messy stuff!!
customer_reviews.author: Veronica Sinclair

customer_reviews.title: Great value especially for multiple-child homes
customer_reviews.text: My kids LOVE this art center!! It is well designed with lots of storage areas for all their supplies, and it has lots of room to work, all 3 of my kids can comfortably work on something at the same time by using all sides. For the price I think it’s a fantastic value.
customer_reviews.author: Kim TwinMom+1

customer_reviews.title: They love it!
customer_reviews.text: Gift for our 4 & 2 year old Home School Great Grandsons. They LOVE it! Perfect size / lots of great features and Mom & Dad love it, too!
customer_reviews.author: Charlotte Watkins

customer_reviews.title: We love this !
customer_reviews.text: Perfect! My son is all about art and craft. We bought this for Christmas and it was the best gift. He sits and plays here for long period of time!
customer_reviews.author: Samantha nagy

customer_reviews.title: Don’t do it
customer_reviews.text: I’ve put a lot of stuff together in my day and this was one of the hardest to assemble. I ended up not fully assembling it and my son just uses part of it. I would not recommend buying it unless you get someone you hate to assembly it for you.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathanjlt

customer_reviews.title: My 2 year old loves it!
customer_reviews.text: Really easy to put together and so cute. My 2 year old loves it. It is really sturdy! I have to continuously remind my 2cyear old not to stand on top of the desk.
customer_reviews.author: kfgnstl

customer_reviews.title: Great Step2 Art Center!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my granddaughter, for Christmas. It was very easy to put together and, of course, made well. Now my granddaughter can work on her creations, while I work on my crafts.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A must have for those little artists!
customer_reviews.text: My son absolutely loves this thing! He draws all day long. Quite a few storage areas on here to hold different things. Cleans easily
customer_reviews.author: LauraAduddell

customer_reviews.title: Good purchase!
customer_reviews.text: My granddaughter loves this. However, not a lot of painting area so I ended up getting a bigger table. Lots of spaces for accessories.
customer_reviews.author: L. Woodard

customer_reviews.title: Missing pieces
customer_reviews.text: I am very disappointed when I received this item. There are 2 pieces missing. The green lid that goes on the side which turns into a bench and also the green piece which acts as pencil holders/cup holder that goes next to the white board. It looks like the one I received was a returned item and no one at the company made sure all the set was complete before re shipping it.
customer_reviews.author: manuela

customer_reviews.title: Cute and simple
customer_reviews.text: My 3 year old loves this. It's definitely got potential to be around as he grows! It was a bit difficult at first to figure out how to put it together as you had to make your own holes ( i don't know if they are all like this) but the plastic isn't that hard to make your own. All in all still totally worth getting!
customer_reviews.author: Megan

customer_reviews.title: Perfect art desk!!!
customer_reviews.text: We love it!! My 4 year old son loves art and this has been the best gift for him. It has the best organizational pieces to keep his supplies together. It also provides everything a kid could need for art fun, a chalkboard, a dry erase board, a desk and places to hang the art and aprons. Love it!!
customer_reviews.author: jc

customer_reviews.title: Toddlers jackpot!
customer_reviews.text: My granddaughter loved this art centre. So much to do, never enough time.
customer_reviews.author: Ellen Andrews

customer_reviews.title: Makes for a happy child
customer_reviews.text: My son loved receiving this on Christmas Day. He has so many options to be creative. Well made and somewhat easy to put together.
customer_reviews.author: Colleen

customer_reviews.title: Kids love it
customer_reviews.text: This art center was easy for one person to assemble. It’s great entertainment for two or three kids at one time.
customer_reviews.author: Pittsburghmom

customer_reviews.title: Lots of fun
customer_reviews.text: Assemply can be a pain in the butt lol, but easy. Just time consuming. My Son loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Anned Aguirre

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars

customer_reviews.title: Perfect gift
customer_reviews.text: Gave this to my grandson for Christmas and he absolutely loves it
customer_reviews.author: vicky cates

customer_reviews.title: Durable. Great price. Grandchildren love it❗️
customer_reviews.text: Great gift for my grandchildren 2 and 5 years old. It was a gift for granddaughter but plenty of room to share. Sturdy. Very happy with product.
customer_reviews.author: ellen cox

customer_reviews.title: Great gift
customer_reviews.text: I bought for my niece for Christmas and she loves it. She’s 1.5 years old. She uses it all the time. It was very easy to set up. It is really big so if you have a small space be cautious

customer_reviews.title: Great item very durable
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my niece she loves it but the assembly sucks! for it being such durable plastic you need power tools for this but once you get it put together its really strong n wont break! If your kid likes art projects I'd recommend this
customer_reviews.author: Amber Plummer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect toddler gift!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely perfect for my 2 and 4 yr olds girls. They both have plenty of room to grow with it. We shopped around on Amazon to find all sorts of fun stuff to go with their new desk!

customer_reviews.title: Cute set up
customer_reviews.text: My husband did not have a hard time putting it together. Very durable, very nice looking. My son likes it so I love it

customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my nephew as a Christmas gift he loves it. Uses it all the time. Every part of it. Takes the mess away from the rest of the play area. All of his supplies are easily accessible and most importantly they are away from the floor and everything put in place

customer_reviews.title: not useful

customer_reviews.title: Open ahead of time

customer_reviews.title: Very nice
customer_reviews.text: Fairly easy to assemble but took an hour. Very sturdy and our toddler loves her desk and art stand.

customer_reviews.title: Love it

customer_reviews.title: A favorite of our 2 year old grand daughters
customer_reviews.text: Multifunctional easy to clean and has lots of storage. Sturdy and cute. Our Granddaughter has used her art center daily.

customer_reviews.title: Great little product
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this item for our grandson in the USA for his second birthday. Our son found it quite easy to install with the vast quantity of screws provided and our grandson loves it ,so many functions on it to keep him amused, a budding artist.
customer_reviews.author: john miles

customer_reviews.title: So fun!
customer_reviews.text: A drill is needed for assembly but it is very durable. I got it for my two year old grandbaby and we have so much fun with it!

customer_reviews.title: DONT BUY THIS!
customer_reviews.text: Only reason I give it a star is for this review to post. Not only did it arrive late but it was also not the item shown in the image nor described in the description. What a disappointment. Do not spend your money on this, you’ll regret it
customer_reviews.author: Alondra Alonso

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy!!! Unless...
customer_reviews.text: Do not buy unless you have time to drill your own holes.

customer_reviews.title: Have a powertool handy !
customer_reviews.text: Once it is assembled it is awesome ! But trying to assemble is the hard part. It comes with all the screws but the actual frames do not have holes. You literally have to drill them in. Other than that my sons loves it !
customer_reviews.author: Jocelyn Ruiz

customer_reviews.title: Artist in the Making!!
customer_reviews.text: This is a fabulous little studio! Would love a bigger table area, but it is a perfect art area that has lots of storage and compartments. Our sons face lit up Christmas morning!
customer_reviews.author: Shelly

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: My son LOVES this. He plays with it every day multiple times a day. Definitely worth the cost and space it consumes.

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase
customer_reviews.text: This was a Christmas present for our 4 year old and she loves it. Assembly was easy took my husband and his friend 20 minutes if that! Great purchase absolutely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Rachel Caron

customer_reviews.title: Longer assembling time. It took 2 hrs to assemble
customer_reviews.text: The products good! I have received it today! My son is so excited!

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: It was a big hit for 4 year old birthday.
customer_reviews.author: Gma

customer_reviews.title: Super Cute
customer_reviews.text: Husband assembled quickly without drill, but his hand hurt by the end. Perfect for our 2 year old! The quality is good for a plastic kids station. I would recommend this product.

customer_reviews.title: Now we wont draw on the walls
customer_reviews.text: My little nephew loves it he's 5 years old and loves to draw best gift ever

customer_reviews.title: Un Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Enjoyed by Lil Picasso 2yr old granddaughter, but not very sturdy.

customer_reviews.title: Great for multiple kids !
customer_reviews.text: My 4 and 2 year love using this bc they can both draw at the same time ! No more fighting woo hoo !

customer_reviews.text: I use it for homeschooling my prekr and I love it.

customer_reviews.text: Love it!!! Perfect for my growing toddler... unfortunately a bit difficult to assemble

customer_reviews.text: This product was very easy to assemble and the multifunctional areas are great when more than one child wants to be an artist.

customer_reviews.title: Packaging
customer_reviews.text: The white board that covers the open area was chipped

customer_reviews.title: Great little table, Grandson loves it
customer_reviews.text: Even though we had pieces missing, my grandson loves this little art studio.

customer_reviews.title: Great item! Sturdy and perfect for my little artist!
customer_reviews.text: My grand daughter loves this! She is a little artist in the making!

customer_reviews.title: Overall it is a nice product. My 2 year old loves it
customer_reviews.text: Overall it is a nice product. My 2 year old loves it. Two big complaints though. #1. Assembly sucks. For a company that chargers as much as they do i feel like they could at least drill in the holes for the screws. #2. The chalk board doesn't erase very well. We will probably go buy some chalk board paint and paint over it. Overall it is a good product and we are happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Bryan Massingill

customer_reviews.title: Defective product
customer_reviews.text: Product came defective. No holes were made where we needed to put in the screws.

customer_reviews.title: Good deal

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: It says it comes with accessories which we took for the pens etc and it did not

customer_reviews.title: Looks like I got one that I was previously returned
customer_reviews.text: Looks like I got one that I was previously returned. I took all the pieces out and made sure I had everything only to find out the holes weren’t or drilled! So now I have to return it

customer_reviews.title: Love !
customer_reviews.text: Nothing at all is wrong with this. Perfect for my son he’s 5 and he loves that he has his own little station for his creative side. I bought a small chair to go with this and I just love it

customer_reviews.title: Great product

customer_reviews.text: My 3 year old loves this for painting, coloring, using her stampers, etc. It’s the perfect art station and cleans up so easily!

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my 4yrs old and 2 yr old nieces they loved it

product_meta.title: Step2 Great Creations Art Center Art Desk Easel
product_meta.description: Mini artists will be able to create the next great masterpiece with the great creations art center by Step2. This kid's art center will allow your little Picasso to create a masterful painting with the kid's art desk or on the double-sided art easel! this Junior art desk features loads of storage space for little ones to organize crayons, finger paints, blocks and other art supplies. The dual design of this art play set will be sure to liven up any child's play room or bedroom. Adult assembly required. Made in the USA of us and imported parts.
feature_bullets: Double-sided kid's art easel features a large dry-erase white board and spacious chalk board
360-degree play allows for imaginative play and all around fun!
Molded-in bench and art desk allow little artists to sit down while they create their next masterpiece!
Built-in trays and spacious art Caddy allows little ones to neatly display their art supplies (art supplies and books not included)
Large storage compartments for coloring books, Notepads, painting supplies and more

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.6 out of 5 stars385 ratings4.6 out of 5 stars
